attachments.title: The battle against bike theft in Portland has begun - BikePortland.org
attachments.text: Things are getting real when it comes to battling bike theft in Portland. Here's an update.
attachments.fallback: BikePortland.org: The battle against bike theft in Portland has begun - BikePortland.org

text: Yeah I see those shopping carts full of front tires around here. It's definitely out of control.
hey i read that guy's story the other day about getting his bike stolen and finding it again
I've biked through the underpass on Taylor and sometimes wonder if those are stolen bikes they're working on...now i'll just start assuming they are and get bitter. oh well.
i know. it's pretty hard to give them the benefit of the doubt anymore.
